argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R = S /\ A = B ) -> R = S ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R = S /\ A = B ) -> A = B ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_imaeq12d | |- ( ( R = S /\ A = B ) -> ( R " A ) = ( S " B ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_sseq12d | |- ( ( R = S /\ A = B ) -> ( ( R " A ) C_ A <-> ( S " B ) C_ B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-he | |- ( R hereditary A <-> ( R " A ) C_ A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-he | |- ( S hereditary B <-> ( S " B ) C_ B ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( ( R = S /\ A = B ) -> ( R hereditary A <-> S hereditary B ) ) |
